sourcesContent:
export const products = [
  {
    id: 1,
    name: "Диван Modern Comfort",
    price: 45000,
    description: "Современный диван с мягкой обивкой",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1555041469-a586c61ea9bc?auto=format&fit=crop&w=1000&q=80",
    category: "диваны",
    style: "современный",
    specifications: [
      "Размеры: 220x90x85 см",
      "Материал обивки: велюр",
      "Цвет: серый",
      "Наполнитель: пенополиуретан"
    ],
    gallery: [
      "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1555041469-a586c61ea9bc?auto=format&fit=crop&w=1000&q=80",
      "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1550581190-9c1c48d21d6c?auto=format&fit=crop&w=1000&q=80",
      "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1493663284031-b7e3aefcae8e?auto=format&fit=crop&w=1000&q=80"
    ]
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    name: "Кресло Vintage",
    price: 28000,
    description: "Удобное кресло в винтажном стиле",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1598300042247-d088f8ab3a91?auto=format&fit=crop&w=1000&q=80",
    category: "кресла",
    style: "винтажный",
    specifications: [
      "Размеры: 80x85x95 см",
      "Материал обивки: кожа",
      "Цвет: коричневый",
      "Основание: массив дуба"
    ],
    gallery: [
      "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1598300042247-d088f8ab3a91?auto=format&fit=crop&w=1000&q=80",
      "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1580480055273-228ff5388ef8?auto=format&fit=crop&w=1000&q=80",
      "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1519947486511-46149fa0a254?auto=format&fit=crop&w=1000&q=80"
    ]
  }
];

export const sliderImages = {
  slide1: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1524758631624-e2822e304c36?auto=format&fit=crop&w=1000&q=80",
